title.rendered: Our Cross-Border Eco-Trail Adventure is Complete, and What an Incredible Journey it Was!

content.rendered:
Our Cross-Border Eco-Trail Adventure is Complete, and What an Incredible Journey it Was! 
 
We’re excited to share the full experience of this unforgettable adventure connecting Peja and Kolašin. From breathtaking hikes and traditional culinary experiences to cultural exchanges, this eco-trail showcased the beauty and sustainability of cross-border tourism.
Watch the highlights of how we brought together nature, culture, and responsible tourism between Kosovo and Montenegro!
 
What you’ll discover:
Unique food tastings at local guesthouses
Guided hiking
Stunning views and eco-friendly accommodations in the heart of nature
 
Join us in celebrating sustainable tourism and building connections across borders!
